item.title: California’s harebrained plastic bag ban
item.description: More evidence that states should focus on market-oriented solutions to environmental problems.

item.title: I’m shocked — shocked! — to find that gambling is going on in the NBA
item.description: The one thing sports can’t survive are fans who no longer trust the games to be on the level.

item.title: The silent success of the Middle East’s peace treaties
item.description: A brutal war tested regional peace — and showed treaties could withstand the test.

item.title: Hold your noses, New Yorkers. Here’s the best choice for mayor.
item.description: As Louisiana voters can tell you, sometimes you have to go with the least-worst candidate.

item.title: Trump is ignoring the real threat matrix
item.description: A puzzling pivot to the Caribbean increasingly leaves Europe to answer Putin’s aggression on its own.

item.title: Trump put universities in a bind. U-Va. charted a way out.
item.description: Colleges need more viewpoint diversity but not external monitors to enforce it.

item.title: Detroit and its outgoing mayor model big-city comeback
item.description: Zohran Mamdani could learn a lot from Mike Duggan.

item.title: I want the GOP to keep control of the House. But not this way.
item.description: My fellow Indiana Republicans shouldn’t cave to White House pressure to redistrict.

item.title: The MAGA case for academic freedom lies in a period Trump loves
item.description: Campus autonomy was a major driver of the can-do America that Trump aims to revive.

item.title: 363 miles that transformed America
item.description: The Erie Canal, dug by human muscle, aided by improvised cleverness, helped build a nation.

item.title: The Supreme Court is poised to erase Black power in the South
item.description: Activist Supreme Court justices threaten the Voting Rights Act.
